Package net.sf.jstuff.core.concurrent

Class HashLockManager<KeyType>

java.lang.Object
net.sf.jstuff.core.concurrent.HashLockManager<KeyType>
public class HashLockManager<KeyType> extends Object
A lock manager that allows to issue thread-owned read-write locks on objects based on object equality ( a.equals(b) ) and NOT on object identity ( a == b ). The implementation internally uses ReentrantReadWriteLock objects.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
